<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.DictionaryHelper</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>DictionaryHelper</name> <script><![CDATA[var DictionaryHelper = Class.create(); DictionaryHelper.prototype = { initialize: function() { },
